summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke discussing investment management details related to a fund managed by db zwirn & co. The communication touches on the roles of various individuals in the fund's management structure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email and is discussing investment management details.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is responding to Epstein's inquiry about investment management and provides details about the fund's structure.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as a recipient of the forwarded email from Epstein.

persons.name: Glenn
persons.context: Glenn is mentioned in the context of being involved with the management of the fund.

persons.name: Henry
persons.context: Henry is mentioned alongside Glenn as a limited partner of the fund's management.

connections.description: Darren Indyke is responding to Epstein's inquiries, indicating a working relationship.
Jes Staley is included in the email correspondence, suggesting a social or professional connection.
Glenn and Henry are mentioned as limited partners in the fund's management, indicating a business relationship.

Darren Indyke provides information about the fund's management structure.
